TARGETLIST_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_TargetList.dept_id = @dept_id AND ( (@target_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_TargetList.target_id LIKE @target_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- ターゲットID AND (@target_name_like_escaped = '' OR w2_TargetList.target_name LIKE '%' + @target_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- ターゲット名 ) AND del_flg = '0'

TARGETLIST_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY w2_TargetList.date_created DESC, -- 常に一定の結果セットを得るため、主キー（昇順）ソート w2_TargetList.dept_id ASC, w2_TargetList.target_id ASC
